article:
## Contents
- [Introduction](#introduction)
- [Objective and Scope](#objective-and-scope)
- [Requirements and Pre-requisites](#requirements-and-pre-requisites)
- [Step-by-Step Instructions](#step-by-step-instructions)
- [Code Snippets and Commands](#code-snippets-and-commands)
- [Troubleshooting and Common Issues](#troubleshooting-and-common-issues)
- [Best Practices and Recommendations](#best-practices-and-recommendations)
- [Summary and Conclusion](#summary-and-conclusion)

## Introduction
The introduction provides a brief overview of the topic, in this case, Github repositories.

## Objective and Scope
This section defines the purpose and scope of the documentation. It explains what the reader can expect to learn and achieve by following the instructions.

## Requirements and Pre-requisites
List any necessary requirements and pre-requisites that the reader should have before proceeding with the instructions. This could include software, hardware, or any other dependencies.

## Step-by-Step Instructions
This section provides detailed, easy-to-follow instructions on how to perform the task or achieve the objective. Each step should be clearly explained and accompanied by any necessary screenshots or diagrams.

## Code Snippets and Commands
If there are any relevant code snippets or terminal commands that the reader needs to use, they should be included in this section. The code should be clearly formatted and explained.

## Troubleshooting and Common Issues
This section addresses any common problems or issues that the reader may encounter while following the instructions. It provides solutions or workarounds for each problem.

## Best Practices and Recommendations
In this section, you can provide tips and recommendations for optimal performance and security. These can include best practices for using Github repositories effectively.

## Summary and Conclusion
This section recaps the key points covered in the documentation and provides a conclusion or final thoughts. It may also include any additional resources or references for further reading.
